text: Emily Kathleen Anne MortimerBirths, Marriages & Deaths Index of England & Wales, 1916â€“2005. (born December 1, 1971) is a British movie, stage, television, stage actress, and comedian. She was in 30 Rock, Scream 3, Match Point, Lars and the Real Girl, Hugo, Cars 2, Shutter Island, Harry Brown, Cars 2, The Pink Panther, The Pink Panther 2, and The Newsroom. She was born in London, England on December 1, 1971. She has been married to Alessandro Nivola since 2003. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London Category:Comedians from London
title: Emily Mortimer
